PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^4Full Guide: ^7https://youtu.be/kY3u4u1fMLA ^1^4Patreon: ^7https://www.patreon.com/EsoroGuides
^2^1^1^7^5^1Build Changes: ^7-Fully leveled Assassin's Mark. -Added Crystallised Omniscience to the Uber Endgame Gearset. An absurdly strong amulet but you'll need some fairly optimized gear to take advantage of it. As you'll need lots of attributes and much more flat accuracy rating than before. -The new Eldritch Implicits can be used extremely well on our gloves to completely circumvent the need for Hunter Influence. There are many good modifiers to choose from but the best will grant additional Strike Targets & Pierces!
^2Best Glove Modifiers: ^7Strike Skills target 1-2 additional nearby Enemies Projectiles Pierce 1-2 additional Targets ^7^6Other Decent Glove Modifiers: ^7% increased Attack Speed While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, % increased Attack Speed % increased Critical Strike Chance for Attacks While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, % increased Critical Strike Chance for Attacks Herald of Ice has % increased Buff Effect % increased Damage per Frenzy Charge While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, % increased Damage per Frenzy Charge % chance to Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit +% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
^2Best Boot Modifiers: ^7Drops Scorched Ground while moving Drops Brittle Ground while moving % increased Elusive Effect % chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments % chance to Avoid Bleeding % chance to Avoid being Poisoned
